content.text:
I have chat data from December 21, 2025 that I need to analyze and create HTML content for a daily report. Here's the raw chat data:

[{"seq":1766249640000,"time":"2025-12-21T00:54:00+08:00","talker":"44156635321@chatroom","talkerName":"【正式班】AI编程社团-风变✖Ai产品黄叔1","isChatRoom":true,"sender":"guanmian","senderName":"三天","isSelf":false,"type":49,"subType":6,"content":"","contents":{"md5":"e304e1f547192f72431f65736ee5531c","title":"WeChat_3.9_Skill.md"}},{"seq":1766249646000,"time":"2025-12-21T00:54:06+08:00","talker":"44156635321@chatroom","talkerName":"【正式班】AI编程社团-风变✖Ai产品黄叔1","isChatRoom":true,"sender":"guanmian","senderName":"三天","isSelf":false,"type":1,"subType":0,"content":"这份skill是解密的内容"},{"seq":1766249660000,"time":"2025-12-21T00:54:20+08:00","talker":"44156635321@chatroom","talkerName":"【正式班】AI编程社团-风变✖Ai产品黄叔1","isChatRoom":true,"sender":"guanmian","senderName":"三天","isSelf":false,"type":1,"subType":0,"content":"有3.9和最新的4.15的解密办法"},{"seq":1766249669000,"time":"2025-12-21T00:54:29+08:00","talker":"44156635321@chatroom","talkerName":"【正式班】AI编程社团-风变✖Ai产品黄叔1","isChatRoom":true,"sender":"guanmian","senderName":"三天","isSelf":false,"type":1,"subType":0,"content":"你们可以拿去喂ai了"}]

And many more messages about Claude Code, mini-program development, Zeabur platform issues, Jimeng watermark removal, etc.

Please analyze this data and create HTML content for each section:

1. NEW_IDEAS_HTML - Extract innovative techniques/tools using CSS class .idea-card
2. QA_HTML - Extract Q&A pairs using .qa-card format 
3. TOPICS_HTML - Hot topics using .topic-card format
4. ACTIVE_USERS_HTML - Top 5 users using .user-chip format
5. Calculate statistics: TOTAL_MESSAGES, ACTIVE_USERS count, TOPIC_COUNT

Format according to the template CSS classes. Focus on technical discussions and solutions shared.
